content: 1 half_double_crochet in the same st as join half_double_crochet in next 20 stitches rotate and work into the blo of the long sides half_double_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in next 14 sts half_double_crochet in next 5 sts rotate and work into the blo of the short side half_double_crochet in next 21 sts chain 1 turn 52 half_double_crochet s 14 single_crochet s 2-3 2 row half_double_crochet in next 26 sts 14 single_crochet 26 half_double_crochet chain 1 turn after r3 fasten_off leaving long tail pages -part 2- with tan holding your book right side up so the back panel of the book is facing you and the spine is on the right-hand side attach yarn in the blo of the first stitch to the left of the spine the first stitch on the short row designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items row 1 in blo chain 1 half_double_crochet in the same st as join half_double_crochet in next 20 stitches rotate and work into the blo of the long sides half_double_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in next 14 sts half_double_crochet in next 5 sts rotate and work into the blo of the short side half_double_crochet in next 21 sts chain 1 turn 52 half_double_crochet s 14 single_crochet s 2-3 2 row half_double_crochet in next 26 sts 14 single_crochet 26 half_double_crochet chain 1 turn after r3 fasten_off leaving long tail using ending tail from part 1 sew the short edges of pages part 1 & part 2 to the short edge of spine then through the flo of pages part 1 & 2 whip stitch the first 26 half_double_crochet s together hide end using ending tail from part 2 sew the short edges of pages part 1 & part 2 to the short edge of spine then through the flo of pages part 1 & 2 whip stitch the first 26 half_double_crochet s together hide end pages -part 3- make 2 with tan row 1 chain 22 starting in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 20 chs chain 1 turn 21 2-6 5 row half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 turn after r6 fasten_off leaving a long tail cut two pieces of plastic canvas to be slightly smaller than pages part 3 using the long tail from pages part 3 sew to the inside short side of the pages and insert a piece of plastic canvas in other words when you are finished sewing these two pieces the only side without plastic canvas should be the side with the purse opening designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items ear with brown row 1 in a magic_ring 8 single_crochet slip_stitch to join chain 2 turn 8 2 double_crochet in same st *double_crochet-increase* 5 times chain 2 turn leaving the rest of sts unworked 3 double_crochet-increase in same st double_crochet-increase single_crochet now the rest in flo 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet *double_crochet double_crochet-increase* 2 times slip_stitch to side of first chain 2 fasten_off leave long
